title: SPEAKING OF WILMINGTON BANDS..... WHERE IS BUDDY SKIPPER? HE HAD THE BEST GROUP OF LOCALS IN THE MID TO LATE 50\'S IN WILMINGTON.  SECOND ONLY TO DOUG CLARK & THE HOT NUTS OUT OF CHAPEL HILL WHO CAME TO WILMINGTON FOR THE SUMMERS!!!!!!!
text:
Buddy
Skipper has performed for the Lumina Daze fundraiser the last two
years. Here's a link to the latest story:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100824/ARTICLES/100829841
